properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 6 at 9:46PM EST until January 8 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
* LAKE SHORE FLOODING...West to northwest winds of 30 mph with
gusts to 35 to 40 knots Tuesday night will diminish to 15 to
25 knots by Wednesday morning. Waves of 6 to 10 feet,
occasionally to 13 feet, are expected Tuesday night into
Wednesday morning. Waves subside to 3 to 5 feet by Wednesday
afternoon.

* TIMING...Tuesday night into Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong west-northwest winds and high wave action
Tuesday night into Wednesday morning will lead to minor beach
erosion and lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY
